pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Methods for Regional Counts // Implements statistical methods for analyzing the counts of areal data, with a focus on the detection of spatial clusters and clustering. The package has a heavy emphasis on spatial scan methods, first introduced by Kulldorff and Nagarwalla (1995) doi:10.1002/sim.4780140809 and Kulldorff (1997) doi:10.1080/03610929708831995.
